name: Called Shot
shortContent: The attacker can target a specific locations on a target at -20 to hit.
content:
The active character attempts to attack a specific or vulnerable
area on his target. The attacker declares a location on his
target (Head, Body, Left Arm, Right Arm, Left Leg, or Right
Leg) and makes a Hard (–20) Weapon Skill Test or a
Hard (–20) Ballistic Skill Test. If he succeeds, he skips the
Determine Hit Location step of the attack and instead hits the
declared location.
